title: Preparing Your Garden for the Growing Season

tasks.task: Preparing a garden for the growing season
subtasks: Check soil moisture to determine if it's ready to be worked
Add compost or peat moss if necessary
Till the garden to create a seedbed
Consider no-till options for some gardens
Plan row spacing for tilling throughout the growing season
Plan plant spacing for adequate growth
Plan crop rotations to prevent disease build-up
Use a garden journal to document plans and notes
